transportAdvice: The historic old town and waterfront promenade are highly walkable, and most major tourist attractions are within easy reach on foot. City buses connect the wider urban area, and taxis are readily available for longer journeys or reaching beaches and suburbs.

weather.description: Cool and quiet winter month with occasional rain and few tourists, good for sightseeing without crowds.
Still cool with some rainy spells, but days can be pleasantly mild and the city remains uncrowded.
Spring begins to arrive with warming temperatures and longer days, though showers are still common.
Mild and increasingly sunny with occasional rain, a pleasant time to explore before the summer rush.
Warm and mostly sunny with comfortable temperatures, ideal for sightseeing and early beach visits.
Hot and sunny with very little rain, beaches begin to fill and the summer atmosphere kicks in.
Peak summer heat with long sunny days, very busy with tourists and excellent beach weather.
Equally hot and sunny as July, the busiest month with crowded beaches and a lively nightlife scene.
Warm and still very pleasant with fewer crowds, one of the best months to visit Split.
Mild autumn temperatures with increasing cloud and occasional rain, but still enjoyable for sightseeing.
Noticeably cooler and wetter as autumn deepens, tourist numbers drop significantly.
Cool and quiet with festive atmosphere in the old town, rain is possible but snow is rare.
